channel.title: Hp Gfx Male
channel.description:
This is the male gfx for the hp cape if you want female request it please.
Model: [url=http://uppit.com/8L0RF5]http://uppit.com/8L0RF5[/url]
Download that and click save to disk then drag it or copy it into your models folder. Log onto your server or someones elses and type : add model 9945 Close the client and open up class23.java and add this with your gfx:
[code]case 645: // This is the GFX ID originalDataID = 0; // gfx.anInt405 = 9945; // This is the Model ID! (Original was 19081) break;[/code]
Increase your [code]int newSpotAnimCount = 4; [/code]by one so if it was [code]int newSpotAnimCount = 4;[/code] then it will now be [code]int newSpotAnimCount = 5 ;[/code]
Save your class23.java and compile then add this command if you want to test it:
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hpemote1")) { stillgfxz(645, absY, absX, 0, 50); //makes the gfx appear and how long it appears for (5 seconds I think) it the 50 }[/code]
Video: http://img532.imageshack.us/flvplayer.swf?f=Tclip0004al8

item.title: Hp Gfx Male
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

[quote=“Hellrayza23, post:10, topic:187614”]Hmmm you could tweak this a little so that the character disappears? I know there is an emote were all your character does is dis and reappear after a matter of seconds[/quote]Then it would be stupid?Just like how many people use the matrix emote on server’s for object training it is to original.Im sure you could use this gfx somehow for something like leveling up or (object training).

Read full topic

item.title: Hp Gfx Male
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

This is the male gfx for the hp cape if you want female request it please.

Model: http://uppit.com/8L0RF5

Download that and click save to disk then drag it or copy it into your models folder.
Log onto your server or someones elses and type : add model 9945
Close the client and open up class23.java and add this with your gfx:

case 645: // This is the GFX ID originalDataID = 0; // gfx.anInt405 = 9945; // This is the Model ID! (Original was 19081) break;

Increase your int newSpotAnimCount = 4; by one so if it was int newSpotAnimCount = 4; then it will now be int newSpotAnimCount = 5 ;

Save your class23.java and compile then add this command if you want to test it:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hpemote1")) { stillgfxz(645, absY, absX, 0, 50); //makes the gfx appear and how long it appears for (5 seconds I think) it the 50 }

Video: http://img532.imageshack.us/flvplayer.swf?f=Tclip0004al8

Read full topic
